quick_answer.text: A large Little Caesars pepperoni pizza has about 2240 calories total.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a Little Caesars pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 280 kcal per slice for a large pepperoni (8 slices total).

faqs.q: What are the macros for a Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Per whole large pepperoni: 264 g carbs, 96 g protein, 112 g fat.

faqs.q: How many calories in Little Caesars cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Around 2040 kcal for a large cheese pizza, less than pepperoni.

faqs.q: Does crust type affect calories in Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Yes—thin crust saves ~320 kcal vs. classic; stuffed crust adds more.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in a Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Yes, about 4960 mg total for a large pepperoni—over daily limit for many.
